downloadTitle: Project Server 2010 IT-Professional Webcast Series slide presentations
downloadDescription: PowerPoint slides for the Microsoft Project Server 2010 IT-Professional Webcast Series training videos for IT-Professionals who deploy, configure, and maintain Project Server 2010.
detailsSection:
This download contains seven Microsoft PowerPoint presentations for the Project 2010 IT-Professional Webcast Series of training presentations. The presentations included in this download are:
  • Microsoft Project Server 2010-Performance Part 1
  • Microsoft Project Server 2010-Performance Part 2
  • Microsoft Project Server 2010-Upgrade and Migration
  • Microsoft Project Server 2010-Backwards Compatibility Mode
  • Microsoft Project Server 2010- Coexisting with SharePoint 2010
  • Microsoft Project Server 2010- Backup and Restore
  • Microsoft Project Server 2010- Operations
The Project 2010 IT-Professional Webcast Series is a set of Project Server 2010 training videos presented by Microsoft product managers and architects that are targeted for the IT-Professional audience. These videos are available to view on-demand through the Microsoft Events and Webcast site. Download and use the corresponding slide presentations to assist in your understanding of the training videos. For a comprehensive list of the Microsoft Project Server 2010 IT-Professional Webcast Series videos, see the TechNet article Project Server 2010 IT-Professional TechNet Webcasts. For additional technical information referenced in the slides, see the Project Server 2010 TechCenter (TechNet). For more information about Project 2010, see the Project 2010 Web site.
systemRequirementsSection: To download and read this file, you must have Microsoft Office PowerPoint 2007 or PowerPoint Viewer 2007.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to transfer the compressed file to your computer. Decompress the file, then you can open the individual .pptx files.
